name: Deli Style Tuna Pasta Salad
description: Yummy meal for the family and friend

ingredients.name: Sour Cream or Plain Greek Yoghurt
Red Wine Vinegar or more according to taste

steps:
1) Bring a large pot of water to a boil, add a generous pinch of salt and add the pasta.

2) Cook the pasta according to package instructions, and about a minute before itâ€™s done, add the peas, cook for the last minute all together, then drain and rinse under cold water to stop it from cooking any further, make sure to drain it really really well.

3) In a really large bowl, combine all the remaining ingredients, add the drained pasta and peas, toss together to make sure everything is well combined, taste for seasoning and adjust to taste, cover and pop it in the fridge for a couple hours before serving.
